subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: See [[w:Han unification|Han unification]] on Wikipedia for differences in appearance by script by code point. Note that the bottom component is written [[毋]] in the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}} but appears as [[母]] in {{w|simplified Chinese}}, {{w|Hanja|Korean}} and {{w|Chữ Nôm|Vietnamese}} scripts.

subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=80|rad=毋|as=04|sn=9|snj=8|four=50507|canj=QMWYI|ids=⿱龶母(GKV),⿱龶毋(HTJ)}} <!-- Note: Mistaken form in T1-5175, Unicode CJK Unified Ideographs -->
